name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: [SOUND]

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: Hello.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: Welcome to the course Text Mining and Analytics.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: My name is ChengXiang Zhai.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _I have a nickname
column6: Cheng. _

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: I am a professor of the Department of Computer Science at the University of

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: This course is a part of a data mining specialization

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: offered by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _In addition to this course
column6: there are four other courses offered by _

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _Professor Jiawei Han
column6: Professor John Hart and me

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: a capstone project course that all of us will teach together.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _This course is particularly related to another course in the specialization

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: mainly text retrieval and search engines in that both courses are about text data.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _In contrast
column6: pattern discovery and cluster analysis are about _

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: algorithms more applicable to all kinds of data in general.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: The visualization course is also relatively general in that the techniques

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: can be applied to all kinds of data.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: This course addresses a pressing need for harnessing big text data.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _Text data has been growing dramatically recently

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: mostly because of the advance of technologies deployed on the web

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: that would enable people to quickly generate text data.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _So
column6: I listed some of the examples on this slide _

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: that can show a variety of text data that are available today.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _For example
column6: if you think about the data on the internet

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: everyday we are seeing many web pages being created.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: Blogs are another kind of new text data that

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: are being generated quickly by people.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: Anyone can write a blog article on the web.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: New articles of course have always been

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: a main kind of text data that being generated everyday.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: Emails are yet another kind of text data.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: And literature is also representing a large portion of text data.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: It's also especially very important because of the high quality

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: in the data.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _That is
column6: we encode our knowledge about the word _

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: using text data represented by all the literature articles.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: It's a vast amount of knowledge of

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: all the text and data in these literature articles.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: Twitter is another representative text data representing social media.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: Of course there are forums as well.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: People are generating tweets very quickly

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: indeed as we are speaking perhaps many people have already written many tweets.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _So
column6: as you can see there are all kinds of text data _

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: that are being generated very quickly.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: Now these text data present some challenges for people.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: It's very hard for anyone to digest all the text data quickly.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _In particular
column6: it's impossible for scientists to read all of the for _

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: example or for anyone to read all the tweets.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: So there's a need for tools to help people digest text data more efficiently.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: There is also another interesting opportunity

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _provided by such big text data
column6: and that is it's possible to leverage _

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: the amount of text data to discover interesting patterns to

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: turn text data into actionable knowledge that can be useful for decision making.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _So for example
column6: product managers may be interested _

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _in knowing the feedback of customers about their products

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: knowing how well their products are being received as

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: compared with the products of competitors.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: This can be a good opportunity for

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: leveraging text data as we have seen a lot of reviews of product on the web.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: So if we can develop a master text mining techniques to tap into such

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _a [INAUDIBLE] to extract the knowledge and opinions of people about these products

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: then we can help these product managers to gain business intelligence or

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: to essentially feedback from their customers.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _In scientific research
column6: for example

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _scientists are interested in knowing the trends of research topics
column6: knowing _

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: about what related fields have discovered.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: This problem is especially important in biology research as well.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _Different communities tend to use different terminologies
column6: yet _

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: they're starting very similar problems.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: So how can we integrate the knowledge that is covered in different communities

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: to help study a particular problem?

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _It's very important
column6: and it can speed up scientific discovery. _

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: So there are many such examples where we can leverage the text data

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: to discover useable knowledge to optimize our decision.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: The main techniques for

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: harnessing big text data are text retrieval and text mining.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _So these are two very much related technologies.Yet

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: they have somewhat different purposes.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: These two kinds of techniques are covered in the tool in this specialization.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _So
column6: text retrieval on search engines covers text retrieval

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: and this is necessary to turn big text data into

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _a much smaller but more relevant text data
column6: which are often the data that _

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: we need to handle a particular problem or to optimize a particular decision.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: This course covers text mining which is a second step in this pipeline

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: that can be used to further process the small amount of relevant data

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: to extract the knowledge or to help people digest the text data easily.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _So the two courses are clearly related
column6: in fact

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: some of the techniques are shared by both text retrieval and text mining.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _If you have already taken the text retrieval course
column6: then you might see _

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _some of the content being repeated in this text mining course
column6: although _

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: we'll be talking about the techniques from a very different perspective.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _If you have not taken the text retrieval course

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: it's also fine because this course is self-contained and

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: you can certainly understand all of the materials without a problem.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: _Of course
column6: you might find it beneficial to take both courses and _

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: that will give you a very complete set of skills to handle big text data.

name: 1 - 1 - Text Mining and Analytics (00-08-15).srt
text: [MUSIC]
